Uses of Class
com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerConfiguration

    • Uses of DirectoryServerConfiguration in com.btmatthews.ldapunit

      Constructors in com.btmatthews.ldapunit with parameters of type DirectoryServerConfiguration 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryServerStatement(org.junit.runners.model.Statement stmt, DirectoryServerConfiguration cfg)
      Initialise the wrapper statement that starts an embedded LDAP directory server and shuts it down before and after executing the wrapped statement.
